sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    HOME_REF,
    MCM_CommunityID,
    HomeName
FROM 
    [dbo].[ColdHarbourHomeID]
WHERE
    MCM_CommunityID IS NOT NULL
    AND HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
    DailyChecks_Mlog.*,
    --DailyChecks_Master.*,
    Home.*
FROM 
    DailyChecks_Mlog

    INNER JOIN dbo.DailyChecks_Master 
        ON dbo.DailyChecks_Mlog.dc_master_id = dbo.DailyChecks_Master.dc_record_id

    INNER JOIN vWelltowerYardiHomes AS Home
        ON Home.IntranetID = DailyChecks_Master.dc_home_id

SELECT 
    DailyChecks_Master.*,
    Home.*
FROM 
    DailyChecks_Master

    INNER JOIN vWelltowerYardiHomes AS Home
        ON Home.IntranetID = DailyChecks_Master.dc_home_id

SELECT 
    DailyChecks_MAP.*,
    Home.*
FROM 
    DailyChecks_MAP

    INNER JOIN vWelltowerYardiHomes AS Home
        ON Home.IntranetID = DailyChecks_MAP.dc_map_home

SELECT 
    DailyChecks_CVlog.*,
    --DailyChecks_Master.*,
    Home.*
FROM 
    DailyChecks_CVlog

    INNER JOIN dbo.DailyChecks_Master 
        ON dbo.DailyChecks_CVlog.dc_master_id = dbo.DailyChecks_Master.dc_record_id

    INNER JOIN vWelltowerYardiHomes AS Home
        ON Home.IntranetID = DailyChecks_Master.dc_home_id

SELECT * 
FROM 
    Checks_Callpoints AS CallPoints

    INNER JOIN vWelltowerYardiHomes AS H
        ON H.IntranetID = CallPoints.HomeID

SELECT * 
FROM 
    Checks_DoorsSensors AS DoorsSensors

    INNER JOIN vWelltowerYardiHomes AS H
        ON H.IntranetID = DoorsSensors.HomeID

SELECT * 
FROM 
    Checks_FEBlankets AS FEBlankets

    INNER JOIN vWelltowerYardiHomes AS H
        ON H.IntranetID = FEBlankets.HomeID

SELECT * 
FROM 
    Checks_FireAlarms AS FireAlarms

    INNER JOIN vWelltowerYardiHomes AS H
        ON H.IntranetID = FireAlarms.HomeID

SELECT * 
FROM 
    Checks_Floors AS Floors

    INNER JOIN vWelltowerYardiHomes AS H
        ON H.IntranetID = Floors.HomeID

SELECT * 
FROM 
    Checks_Hoists AS Hoists

    INNER JOIN vWelltowerYardiHomes AS H
        ON H.IntranetID = Hoists.HomeID

SELECT * 
FROM 
    Checks_Inventory_General AS Inventory_General

    INNER JOIN vWelltowerYardiHomes AS H
        ON H.IntranetID = Inventory_General.HomeID

SELECT * 
FROM 
    Checks_Master

    INNER JOIN vWelltowerYardiHomes AS H
        ON H.IntranetID = Checks_Master.HomeID

SELECT * 
FROM 
    Checks_ResultSets AS ResultSets

    INNER JOIN vWelltowerYardiHomes AS H
        ON H.IntranetID = ResultSets.HomeID

SELECT * 
FROM 
    Checks_NurseCallLocations AS NurseCallLocations

    INNER JOIN vWelltowerYardiHomes AS H
        ON H.IntranetID = NurseCallLocations.HomeID

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT HOME_REF, HomeName, SITE_REF, IntranetID FROM ColdHarbourHomeID WHERE HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'

properties.description: Deletes files older than 4 days from the archive to prevent build up
Moves the user and result files to Fileshare to be combined by a python script in the VM. Moves Verification files to another folder.
Moves the merged user and result file back to YourHippo container.

activities.name: Copy Merged files
activities.description: Move merged files to AZ storage container

properties.description: Inserts results into the stage table and upserts user table

activities.name: Copy merged results data to Stage table
Upsert users data to Users table

dependsOn.activity: Copy merged results data to Stage table

activities.name: Exceptions
activities.description: Add any exceptions to a Exception table, to be retried at a later date

dependsOn.activity: Upsert users data to Users table
Upsert users data to Users table
Copy merged results data to Stage table

properties.description: Exports the current monthh actuals/TB/Journel Entries from the Actuals table from TRANSFORM_DB. This table is loaded by the excel file macro on 192.168.1.165 (also hosted on the S drive). Taking data from Exchequer using the OLE links.

activities.name: Does WebhookFiles Result files exists
activities.description: Checks there are files to process. If there are it will succeeds and carry on, if not it fails with custom failure message

activities.name: Does WebhookFiles User files exists
activities.description: Checks there are files to process. If there are it will succeeds and carry on, if not it fails with custom failure message

activities.name: Get MCM Data
activities.description: Get the MCM data via Azure function

properties.description: Get data from the supplied endpoint (query/report) for the supplied community ID
